title: Italian sausage pasta
ingredients: ['450g pasta shells', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1/2 tablespoon finely minced onion', '1 yellow or orange pepper, thinly sliced', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '450g Italian sausagemeat', '1 (400g) tin whole plum tomatoes', '250ml double cream', '80g grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley']
